# The `LexicalScopes` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lexicalscopes">LexicalScopes</a> - This class provides interface to collect and use lexical scoping information from machine instruction. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LexicalScopes</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lexicalscopes">LexicalScopes</a> - This class provides interface to collect and use lexical scoping information from machine instruction.

Definition at line 141 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/lexicalscopes-h">LexicalScopes.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Typedefs

### BlockSetT {#a0254e1b8b19e02f9f01fd111f35e71d1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::LexicalScopes::BlockSetT =  SmallPtrSet&lt;const MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</>}>
Map a location to the set of basic blocks it dominates.

This is a cache for <a href="#a6478937e0927f9038e58dca2e03e38ab">LexicalScopes::getMachineBasicBlocks</a> results.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/lexicalscopes-h/#l00253">253</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/lexicalscopes-h">LexicalScopes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMachineBasicBlocks() {#a6478937e0927f9038e58dca2e03e38ab}

<MemberDefinition
